ResourceHeader.Description: This date set contains total electron content (TEC) and global ionospheric maps estimated every 15 minutes by the International GNSS Service (IGS) Analysis Centre. IGS uses the averages of 4 methods, including CODE (U Bern Switzerland), ESA (ESOC Darmstadt Germany), JPL (Jet Propulsion Lab. in Pasadena USA), and UPC (U Politec. Catalonia Barcelona Spain). The data set contains rapid TEC global maps and movies of TEC (10^16 m-2) in cylindrical projection; rapid RMS maps and errors of TEC in cylindrical projection; and rapid TEC maps and movies in polar projection. Continuous coverage is not guaranteed.

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via ftp from SPDF

AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: GPS Total Electron Content (TEC) 15-min data with subset, plot, list functionalities. from CDAWeb

TimeSpan.Note: Data are presently current within a few weeks
